title: Strengthening Leadership Practice Competencies: Educational Technology Leadership Online Doctoral Program Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply transformative learning theory in an online educational environment to design educational technology leadership strategies.
Learners can build and operate collaborative communities between academia and practitioners using a digital platform.
Learners can develop and validate a research-based instructional design framework in a hybrid education model.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
